The singular value matrix Σ is unique, but it requires some attention. singular value
matrixObserve that the Σ ∈Rm×n is rectangular. In particular,Σ is of the same
size as A. This means that Σ has a diagonal submatrix that contains the
singular values and needs additional zero padding. Speciﬁcally , ifm>n ,
then the matrix Σ has diagonal structure up to row nand then consists of
